briefTitle: Evaluation of the RESTART Survival Programme
officialTitle: Evaluation of the RESTART Survival Programme
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Assessment of satisfaction with participation in the Restart programme and its various components via Likert scale and open questions.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Age \>= 18 at the time of signing the ICF
2. Minimum understanding of French
3. Signed study informed consent form obtained prior to any study-related procedure.
4. Participation in the RESTART programme
5. Patient with curative breast cancer (AJCC stage I-II-III)

Exclusion Criteria:

-
